action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a group of people playing a game of tic-tac-toe on a chalkboard. There are three people in the image, each with different colored pieces. The board is divided into nine squares, with the center square being empty. The people are standing around the board, with one person on the left side, one on the right side, and one in the center. The chalkboard is white and has various other drawings on it, including a plus sign and a cross.
